snippet: Republicans have tried hard to disqualify millions of voters. A heavy turnout at the polls would send a strong message.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Republican efforts to intimidate voters at polling places and otherwsie depress Democratic voter turnout; calls on voters to reject such tactics by casting their votes.
lead_paragraph: Republicans have tried hard to disqualify millions of voters. A heavy turnout at the polls would send a strong message.

headline.content_kicker: Editorial | The Struggle to Cast a Vote
